Text:
Hi!
This one works great just be sure you open the patch folder first and read the readme file.
It`s not the latest version,the updater says: The most recent release is build 698. I hope someone finds a crack or patch to that one :)

Works great!

Nfo and instrections are very poor!
1-Install the trial
2-Stop the DK Service
3-put the licence file and crack onthe installation folder
4-run the crack, it will start the service again
5-Yo'll see the option to activate, YOU DONT NEED THIS, set it to LATER AND NEVER SHOW AGAIN!
anyone know any alternatives to this? not that it doesnt work, just wanna try out some different applications.
I know a verry good defragmenter its called 0&0 defragmenter search for it download the pro edition.

I did exactly as described by "ratusnatus" just above and it works perfectly for me. Before I tried all others cracks, no one worked.

Before to install Version 11, deinstall all previous versions !!! Reboot your machine.

Thanks for the crackers and the uploader of this torrent :)

Cheers :)

I followed ratusnatus' instructions and it works perfectly, thanks man.

Also, this is the Pro Premier version in case you're wondering.

just installed as directed by domdom95 and ratusnatus everything seems to be working fine.

 checked and program says no key needed after i did as all instructions said. so i guess this means everything is good.

 i also ran my reg cleaner first before installing this version and removed anything that said diskeeper also ran search and did same. 

i burnt this app to a cd-rw first so i did not delete by mistake, and put it back in after i had everything that had to do with old diskeeper removed, then installed this app.to computer again to folder i use for bittorrent downloads so i could seed it back.everything worked fine after.

i also copyed the app. to another folder before i opened it.

 i unticked auto defrag when i installed so program was sure not to run when i used enclosed license file and crack. then i opened program and reset it to work automatically.

 everything is go now. thanks for the upload of this fine app.

I downloaded this and followed instructions by ratusnatus (thanks by the way), but in step 

4-run the crack, it will start the service again

the service just didn't restart by itself I had to do it manually. Did anyone experienced this?

Also step 5 is not there for me. As I go under the  Help/About menu there is no infos. Am I supposed to get any kind of infos there ? A funky name as we get sometimes from cracks or other?

Thanks for sharing infos.

I love Diskkeper but there are some other good ones to like Perfect Disk 2008 and O&O Defrag
Try out these too. The latest vers of Diskeeper is 12.0.758 2008.
